title: Island Woman: A Novel
description: ISLAND WOMAN combines the best parts of adventure, romance, mystery, sci-fi, and history in this rollicking adventure. Abbie Spence, a recent college graduate, finds herself stranded back in time as part of an eccentric Englishman's nefarious plan. On this amazing journey, Abbie encounters Indians, Spaniards, and pirates on her travels along the west coast of New Spain in search of a way home.
author: Richard Sessions
